entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
